events.text: RaceStart, RaceActive, RaceOver, Rewind, Replay, Pause (TO-DO)

children.text: Turn off moving obstacles if they are disabled
Hide static obstacles if they are disabled
Turn moving bonuses into static if they are disabled
Hide static bonuses if they are disabled
Apply smoke and tire effect when needed

parameters.expression: (0.25 + anglediff(Car.Angle, angle(Car.X, Car.Y, RocketTarget.X, RocketTarget.Y)) / 180 ) * distance(Car.X, Car.Y, RocketTarget.X, RocketTarget.Y)

children.text: This condition added to decrease CPU utilization - every 2nd frame will be skipped

parameters.message: "Хорошая была попытка! Нажми [R] для перезапуска или [ESC] для выхода в меню"

parameters.expression: (0.25 + anglediff(Car.Angle, angle(Car.X, Car.Y, RocketTarget.X, RocketTarget.Y)) / 180 ) * distance(Car.X, Car.Y, RocketTarget.X, RocketTarget.Y)

actions.text: Remember: car information is recorded at a constant 50 fps rate
